location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George F Sadlier, Captain 47thRegiment & Major, Bushire to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a communication received by Major Sadlier from R Armstrong, dated 14 June 1815. The enclosed letter is requesting permission to seek passage to India on board the Alexander, citing medical requirements that cannot be met on board the Duncan.
